tabTitle: Astras - Trading terminal of Alor Broker

step1.title: Portfolio select
step1.text: The portfolio you have selected is displayed here. Orders will be made on behalf of the portfolio

step2.title: Add widget
step2.text: Here you can add a new widget

step3.title: New order
step3.text: Create a new order. You can also create an order by clicking on the line in the orderbook

step4.title: Dashboards
step4.text: Here you can select a dashboard, create a new one, or add/remove to favorites

step5.title: User menu
step5.text: Here you can change the terminal settings and see external links

step6.title: Remove
step6.text: Removes the widget from the dashboard. You can add it again via the panel above

step8.title: Link to active
step8.text: If the lock is closed, then the widget monitors the active instrument and/or portfolio and changes when it changes

step9.title: Settings
step9.text: Here you can change the settings of a widget

form.orderbookDepthWarning: The orderbook will be updating no more than 2 times per second when choosing a depth greater than 20. This is a temporary measure until the extended orderbooks are fully put into exploitation.
